In the header we have made contains two navs navleft and navright. navleft will contain the heading of blog, while navright will contain the menu of the blog. Now let’s continue editing the previous blog

HTML

Output:


My Blog
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
  • Write for us


    • Now let’s style our navbar
    Make main.css

    Output:

    My Blog
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
  • Write for us

    • If you like you can also add fancy things like fa fa-icons, or change the font
